patthana16.46:1.1_0: Anidassanaappaṭighaṁ hetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naanidassanaappaṭigho nahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana16.46:1.1_1: Anidassanaappaṭighaṁ hetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasanidassanasappaṭigho nahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā …pe… anidassanaappaṭighaṁ hetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasanidassanasappaṭigho nahetu ca naanidassanasappaṭigho nahetu ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā cha,
patthana16.46:2.1_0: Anidassanaappaṭighaṁ nahetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasanidassanasappaṭigho nanahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana16.46:2.1_1: Anidassanaappaṭighaṁ nahetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naanidassanasappaṭigho nanahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana16.46:2.1_2: Anidassanaappaṭighaṁ nahetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasanidassanasappaṭigho nanahetu ca naanidassanasappaṭigho nanahetu ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.
